title: Suggestion - Texture Packs?
body:
Basically, my idea is:

Texture Packs - Customizable Textures, without having to use external tools. 
Be able to edit Minions & Jungle Monsters, Map Resources, even the Air Client!

And, because there are rumors of Riot wanting more and more money, how about Riot making packs that cost IP/RP? (not too expensive, please!)

Let me know what you think Rioters!

replies.body: This idea is not new m9
